	{margin-bottom:0in;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1032"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]--><o:SmartTagType name="place" namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags"></o:SmartTagType><o:SmartTagType name="PlaceName" namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags"></o:SmartTagType><o:SmartTagType name="PlaceType" namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags"></o:SmartTagType>
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem A</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>R U Kidding Mr. Feynman?</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output</span><span
lang=EN style='color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
 coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
 filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:21pt;width:119.95pt;height:153pt;
 z-index:1'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/./a_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square" anchorx="page"/>
</v:shape><![if gte mso 9]><o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="MSPhotoEd.3"
 ShapeID="_x0000_s1027" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1117007124">
</o:OLEObject>
<![endif]><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=160 height=204
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/./a_files/image001.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1027"><![endif]><span
lang=EN style='color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN'>Richard P. Feynman was a
musician, artist, scientist, teacher and Nobel lauriet. He contributed to the development
of the atomic bomb, expanded the understanding of quantumelectrodynamics,
translated Mayan hieroglyphics, and cut to the heart of the Challenger
disaster. But beyond all of that, Richard Feynman was a unique and
multi-faceted individual and he was famous for his unbelievable stories,
unusual life style and his popular books and lectures on mathematics and
physics. Once, in Brazil, Feynman got into a kind of a competition with a
native to see who could do faster simple aritmethics, Feynman or an abacus&nbsp;
(aka an manual calculator machine)! Feynman lost in operations such as addition
and multiplication but he won in cubic roots. Given the number <b>1729.03</b>
he got the result of <b>12.002</b> at the end of a few seconds while his
oponent got <b>12.0</b>! <o:p></o:p></span></p>
<table>
<tr>
<td><img width=229 height=231
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/./a_files/image001.png" ></td><td><img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/./a_files/image001.png" ></td>
</tr>
</table>




<p style='margin-left:.25in'><span lang=EN style='color:black;mso-ansi-language:
EN'><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='color:black;mso-ansi-language:
EN'>Considering an square of side <b>'a'</b>, with area <b>'a*a'</b>, if you do
a small increment of <b>'dx'</b> on each side , you will get a square with area
of the square with side <b>'a'</b> (Light gray) plus the area of the two small
rips (Medium Gray) on top plus the area of the small square(dark gray). Since
this is only an approximated method, we can ignore this small area ((dx)²).
Then just get value of dx, and substitute in (1).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='color:black;mso-ansi-language:
EN'>Example,<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='color:black;mso-ansi-language:
EN'>To calculate square root of 17</b>, as Feynman has an excelent memory, he knows
'all' perfect squares (as well cubes), he knows that <b>4*4</b> = <b>16</b>
then he just use the method above and calculate <b>4+1/8</b> that equals <b>4.125</b>
(not very bad as<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span><b>square root of 17= 4.123...</b>)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p><span lang=EN style='color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN'>As Feynman is very
lazy, and he doesn't like subtractions at all, he doesn't use negative dx....
(it's boring.. )<br>
<br>
Your Task is to generalize this procedure to the cubic root, and HELP FEYNMAN!
(Just do it, What do you care what other people think?) <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><a name=SECTION0001001000000000000000><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span></a><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='color:black;
mso-ansi-language:EN'>The input contains a positive floating-point number per
line in the inteval <b>[1
1000000] </b>(inclusive). The last line of the input
file contains a number <b>0</b> (zero), This zero should not be processed.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><a name=SECTION0001002000000000000000><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></span></a></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001002000000000000000'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output</span></span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each line of input print the value of the cubic root
approximated by the method explained above. Print the value rounded upto four
digits after the decimal point.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black'>Sample Input<span
style="mso-spacerun: yes">                             </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

  <td width=308 valign=top style='width:231.1pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;

  lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;color:black;
  mso-ansi-language:EN'>64.0000<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;color:black;

  12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=308 valign=top style='width:231.15pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span
  lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;color:black;
  mso-ansi-language:EN'>12.0024<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;color:black;
  mso-ansi-language:EN'>4.0000<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span

10510||||||false||||||
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD><TITLE>Cactus</TITLE>
<META http-equiv=Content-Type content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
<META content="MSHTML 6.00.2600.0" name=GENERATOR></HEAD>
<BODY>
<CENTER><B><FONT size=5>Problem B</FONT></B><BR><B><FONT 
size=6>Cactus</FONT></B><BR><B>Input:</B> standard input<BR><B>Output:</B> 
standard output
<P></P></CENTER><IMG src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10510a.jpg"  align=right> 
<P>A directed graph is a set <B>V</B> of <I>vertices</I> and a set of <B>E</B> &#8712; 
{<B>V</B> x <B>V</B>} <I>edges</I>. An edge <B>(u,v)</B> is said to be directed 
from <B>u</B> to <B>v</B> (the edge <B>(v,u)</B> has the opposite direction). A 
directed cycle in a directed graph is a sequence of edges </P>
<P><B>(u<SUB>1</SUB>, v<SUB>1</SUB>), (u<SUB>2</SUB>, v<SUB>2</SUB>),
, 
(u<SUB>k</SUB>, v<SUB>k</SUB>)</B> </P>
<P>such that <B>u<SUB>i+1</SUB> = v<SUB>i</SUB></B> for <B>i = 1, 
, k-1</B>, 
and <B>u<SUB>1</SUB>=v<SUB>k</SUB></B>. The directed cycle is <I>simple</I> if 
<B>u<SUB>i</SUB> &#8800; u<SUB>j</SUB></B> whenever <B>i &#8800; j</B> (i.e., if it does not 
pass through a vertex twice). </P>
<P>In a <I>strongly connected</I> directed graph, there is for every pair 
<B>u,v</B> of vertices some directed cycle (not necessarily simple) that visits 
both <B>u</B> and <B>v</B>. </P>
<CENTER><IMG src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10510a.jpg" ></CENTER>
<P>A directed graph is a <I>cactus</I> if and only if it is strongly connected 
and each edge is part of exactly one directed simple cycle. The first graph is a 
cactus, but the second one is not since for instance the edge <B>(0,1)</B> is in 
two simple cycles. </P>
<P>The reason for the name is that a "cactus" consists of several simple cycles 
connected to each other in a tree-like fashion, making it look somewhat like a 
cactus. </P>
<H2>Problem</H2>
<P>Write a program that given a directed graph determines if it is a cactus or 
not. The graph can have several thousand vertices. </P>
<H2>Input</H2>The first line contains an integer which is the number of test 
cases (less than 20). Each test case starts a line with an integer <B>n</B> &#8805; 0 
followed by line with an integer <B>m</B> &#8805; 0 giving the number of vertices 
(<B>n</B>) and edges (<B>m</B>) in a graph (at most 10,000 of each). The 
vertices are numbered <B>0</B> through <B>n-1</B>. The following <B>m</B> lines 
describe the edges as pairs of numbers <B>u</B> <B>v</B> denoting an edge 
directed from <B>u</B> to <B>v</B>. There will never be more than one edge from 
<B>u</B> to <B>v</B> for any pair of vertices <B>u</B> and <B>v</B>. There are 
no loops, i.e., no edges from a vertex to itself. 
<H2>Output</H2>
<P>For each test case output a single line with a single string. Output "YES" if 
the graph is a cactus, and output "NO" if it is not. </P>
<H2>Sample Input</H2><PRE>2
4
5
0 1
1 2
2 0
2 3
3 2
4
5
0 1
1 2
2 3
3 0
1 3
</PRE>
<H2>Sample Output</H2><PRE>YES
NO
</PRE>
<HR>

<ADDRESS>Problem setter: Mikael Goldmann</ADDRESS></BODY></HTML>

______________________________________________________

	{margin-bottom:0in;}
ul
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]--><o:SmartTagType name="place" namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags"></o:SmartTagType><o:SmartTagType name="PlaceName" namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags"></o:SmartTagType><o:SmartTagType name="PlaceType" namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags"></o:SmartTagType>
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633cc" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem C</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Councilling</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText3>Each resident of a particular town is a member of zero or
more clubs and also a member of exactly one political party. Each club is to
nominate one of its members to represent it on the town council so that the
number of council members belonging to any given party does not equal or exceed
half the membership of the council. The same person may not represent two
clubs; that is there must be a 1-1 relationship between clubs and council
members. Your job is to select the council members subject to these
constraints. </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText3><span style='font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText3>In the first line of input there will be an integer T,
giving the number of test cases. The next line will be blank. Each of the T
test cases consists of up to 1000 lines, each naming a resident, a party, and a
list of clubs to which the resident belongs. Names are alphanumeric and
separated by a single space. Each resident appears in exactly one input line.
Input lines do not exceed 80 characters. Every set of input ends with a blank
line. </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText3><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText3>For each test case, follow the following format: Each
line should name a council member followed by the club represented by the
member. If several answers are possible, any will do. If no council can be
formed, print the word &quot;Impossible.&quot; in a line. There will be a blank
line in between two test cases. </p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>fred dinosaur jets jetsons<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>john rhinocerous jets rockets<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>mary rhinocerous jetsons rockets<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>ruth platypus rockets<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>fred dinosaur jets jetsons<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>john rhinocerous jets rockets<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>mary rhinocerous jetsons rockets<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>ruth platypus rockets</span></b></pre><pre><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span

  <td width=297 valign=top style='width:222.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span

  </td>

</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1036"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
<meta name=description content=Exponentiation>
<meta name=keywords content=htmlatex>
<meta name=resource-type content=document>
<meta name=distribution content=global>
</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=blue style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>A Day in Math-land</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='color:black'>X</span></b><span
style='color:black'> and <b>Y</b> are two integer numbers and <b>X&gt;=Y</b>.
The values of <b>X</b> and <b>Y</b> fits in <b>16</b>-bit signed integer. When
the summation of these two numbers is multiplied with <b>Y</b> we get <b>P</b>
and when the absolute value of the subtraction of these two numbers is
multiplied with <b>X</b> we get <b>Q</b>. Given the value of <b>P</b> and <b>Q</b>
you must find the value of <b>X</b> and <b>Y</b>.<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of the input file
contains an integer <b>N (N&lt;=75000)</b> that denotes how many lines of
inputs are there. Each of the next <b>N</b> lines contains two integers which
denotes the values <b>P</b> and <b>Q</b> respectively, here |<b>P|&lt;2^31,
|Q|&lt;2^31.</b><span style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='color:black;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For each line of input except the first one produce
exactly two lines of output. The first line contains the serial of output and
the next one contains possible values of </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='color:black'>X</span></b><span style='color:black;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> and </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='color:black'>Y</span></b><span style='color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'> (One pair of values in each line).  If there is more than
one solution print the pair with smaller </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='color:black'>X </span></b><span style='color:black;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>value. When the given values of </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:black'>P</span></b><span
style='color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> and </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='color:black'>Q</span></b><span style='color:black;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> is impossible for any integer value of </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:black'>X</span></b><span
style='color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> and </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='color:black'>Y</span></b><span style='color:black;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> print the line </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='color:black'>&#8220;Impossible.&#8221;</span></b><span
style='color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> instead.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='color:black;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1><span style='font-family:Arial;color:black'>Sample Input<span
style="mso-spacerun:
yes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>160 48<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>200 100<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>300 200</span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>&nbsp;</span><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=297 valign=top style='width:222.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1:<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>12
  8<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  2:<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Impossible.<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  3:<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>20
  10<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<p class=MsoCaption>Problemsetter: Shahriar Manzoor </p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1090"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633cc" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Bangladesh Sequences</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Bangladesh
Sequences are sequences of at most <b>15</b> letters. The allowed letters in
the sequence of length <b>15</b> are <b>A</b>, <b>B</b>, <b>C</b>, <b>D</b>, <b>E</b>,
<b>F</b>, <b>G</b>, <b>H</b>, <b>I</b>, <b>J</b>, <b>K</b>, <b>L</b>, <b>M,</b>
<b>N </b>and<b> O</b>. Similarly allowed letters in a sequence of length <b>4</b>
are <b>A, B, C, D; </b>allowed letters in a sequence of length <b>5</b> are <b>A,
B, C, D, E</b> and so on. The first <b>15</b> letters of English alphabet have
the values <b>65</b>, <b>66</b>, <b>67</b>, <b>68</b>, <b>69</b>, <b>70</b>, <b>71</b>,
<b>72</b>, <b>73</b>, <b>74</b>, <b>75</b>, <b>76</b>, <b>77,</b> <b>78</b> and
<b>79</b> respectively. A sequence of length <b>n (n&lt;16)</b> formed with
first <b>n</b> letters of English alphabet is called Bangladesh Sequence if it
fulfills at least one of the following conditions (Multiple fulfillment is also
not harmful):&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in left 143.25pt'><![if !supportLists]>a)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>If
any two characters are equal. So <b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>A</span></b><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>B<b>A</b>D</span> is a Bangladesh sequence
according to this rule only. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in left 143.25pt'><![if !supportLists]>b)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>If
the absolute value of the difference of position of any two characters is equal
to the absolute value of the difference of their values. So <b>AB</b>CD is a Bangladesh
sequence according to this rule. Position of <b>A </b>is <b>1</b> and position
of <b>B </b>is <b>2</b>, <b>|2-1|=1</b> and <b>|A-B|=|65-66|=1</b> as well.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in left 143.25pt'><![if !supportLists]>c)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>If
the value of any two adjacent characters differ by two. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in left 143.25pt'><![if !supportLists]>d)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>If
the value of any two characters who has one character between them differs by <b>1</b>.
</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>You will have
to find the number of Bangladesh Sequences under some given constraints.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>The input file
contains less than <b>502</b> sets of input. Each set starts with an integer <b>n</b>,
which indicates that this set is speaking about a Bangladesh sequence of length
<b>n</b>. The next <b>n</b> lines define the constraints of the <b>n</b>
positions of the sequence. A question mark means that in the corresponding
position any one of the first <b>n</b> characters of English alphabet is
feasible. If the line contains one or more alphabet instead of <b>?</b> then
it means that those characters are allowed in the corresponding position. For
example the second set in the sample input asks to find Bangladesh Sequence of
length <b>4</b>, whose first character can only be <b>A</b> and <b>B</b>
although other positions can contain any one of the characters <b>A</b>, <b>B</b>,
<b>C</b> and <b>D</b>. Input is terminated by a set whose value of <b>n</b>
is zero. This set should not be produced. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 style='tab-stops:143.25pt'><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>For each set of input produce one line of output. This line should
contain the output serial no as shown in the sample output and then it should
contain how many Bangladesh sequences are there with the given constraints and
length.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>AB<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>?<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>CD<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>?<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>AB<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>?<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>?<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>?<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=297 valign=top style='width:222.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 64<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></b></p>

  </td>
 </tr>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<title>Problem F - River Crossing</title>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:DocumentProperties>
  <o:Author>Shahriar Manzoor</o:Author>

 </o:DocumentProperties>

  <w:View>Print</w:View>
  <w:Zoom>BestFit</w:Zoom>
 </w:WordDocument>
</xml><![endif]-->
<style>
<!--
 /* Font Definitions */
@font-face
	{font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";

	mso-font-signature:-1 -369098753 63 0 4129023 0;}

	{mso-style-parent:" ;

	{mso-style-next:Normal;

	{margin-right:0in;

	{margin:0in;

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem F</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>River Crossing</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output</span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>A group of travelers have reached a river, which
they intend to cross by building a small raft. However, they're terrified of
the water as they can't swim, and they fear the raft might break apart any
moment while they're using it. So, they would like to cross the river by
traveling as little as possible over water. The river also contains some
islands. They can use the raft to reach an island and then carry the raft over
land and leave the island at some other point. The picture bellow shows a
possible scenario. The shortest distance, counting only the distance over
water, is shown with black straight lines (red for online contestants) on the
river. </p>
<center><img width=510 height=250
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10514.jpg" ></center>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Write a program which, given the shape of the
river (two sequences of connected line segments) and the islands (simple
polygons), calculates the shortest distance required to travel over water in
order to cross the river. The travelers must cross the river within the area of
the map. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>The input consists of several scenarios. The first
line contains the number of scenarios (at most <b>20</b>). Next follows each
scenario. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Each scenario starts with a line containing three
integers: <b>r<sub>1</sub></b>, <b>r<sub>2</sub></b> (<b>2</b> &lt;= <b>r<sub>1</sub></b>,
<b>r<sub>2</sub></b> &lt;= <b>100</b>) and <b>n</b> (<b>0</b> &lt;= <b>n</b>
&lt;= <b>11</b>). Then follows <b>r<sub>1</sub></b> pair of integers,
describing the coordinates (<b>x</b>,<b>y</b>) of one river bank. This is
followed by another <b>r<sub>2</sub></b> pair of integers, describing the other
river bank. The two river banks will not intersect nor touch each other. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Next follows the description of <b>n</b> island.
Each island description starts with an integer <b>m</b> (<b>3</b> &lt;= <b>m</b>
&lt;= <b>20</b>), the number of vertices in the polygon. Then follows <b>m</b>
pairs of integers describing the coordinates (<b>x</b>,<b>y</b>) of the
polygon, either in clockwise or counter clockwise direction. All islands will
be simple polygons that lie between the two river banks, and they will neither
overlap nor touch each other or the river banks. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>All coordinates in the input will be between <b>0</b>
and <b>10,000</b>, inclusive. The two sequences of line segments describing the
riverbanks will both start at x-coordinate <b>0</b> and end at same positive
x-coordinate. All other x-coordinates in the input for that scenario, including
those for the islands, will have x-coordinates between these two endpoints. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>All integers in the input will be separated by at
least one space or new line. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>For each scenario, output on a line by itself the
shortest distance that must be travelled on water to cross the river. The
precision should be to 3 decimal places, correctly rounded. </p>

<h2><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#d9d9d9" style='background:
 #D9D9D9;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=677 valign=top style='width:7.05in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>15 14 4<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0 9 7 7 10 7 16 11 20 12 24 11 25 9 24 4 25 2 31 1 38 3 41 11 44 15 49 17 51 17<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0 19 3 20 8 19 11 19 15 21 21 23 25 23 26 20 26 18 34 19 37 21 42 23 47 24 51 24<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>4<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>5 11 9 11 7 15 4 14<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>3<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>17 14 16 16 19 17<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>3<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>28 15 33 13 30 17<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>6<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>31 5 27 7 29 12 31 8 35 9 34 6<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2 2 0<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0 0 1000 0<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0 100 1000 100</b></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<pre><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></pre>

<h2 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample Output</span><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#d9d9d9" style='background:
 #D9D9D9;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=677 valign=top style='width:7.05in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>6.256<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>100.000</b></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal><i>Note:</i> The first scenario in the sample input
corresponds to the map on the picture. <o:p></o:p></p>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<h1>Problemsetter: Jimmy Mårdell</h1>

</div>

<title>Problem G - Power et al.</title>

<style>
<!--

	{font-family:Wingdings;

p.MsoBodyText, li.MsoBodyText, div.MsoBodyText
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.MsoBodyText2, li.MsoBodyText2, div.MsoBodyText2
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	text-align:justify;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	color:black;
	mso-bidi-font-weight:bold;}
a:link, span.MsoHyperlink
	{color:#6633CC;
	text-decoration:underline;
	text-underline:single;}
a:visited, span.MsoHyperlinkFollowed
	{color:purple;
	text-decoration:underline;
	text-underline:single;}
em
	{mso-bidi-font-style:normal;}
pre
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Courier New";}
p.Preformatted, li.Preformatted, div.Preformatted
	{mso-style-name:Preformatted;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:none;
	tab-stops:0in 47.95pt 95.9pt 143.85pt 191.8pt 239.75pt 287.7pt 335.65pt 383.6pt 431.55pt 479.5pt;
	layout-grid-mode:char;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
span.StyleArial16pt
	{mso-style-name:"Style Arial 16 pt";
	mso-ansi-font-size:16.0pt;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;
	margin:1.0in 1.0in 1.0in 1.0in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
 /* List Definitions */
@list l0
	{mso-list-id:1248344018;
	mso-list-type:hybrid;
	mso-list-template-ids:1482442014 67698711 67698713 67698715 67698703 67698713 67698715 67698703 67698713 67698715;}

	text-indent:-.25in;}

	{margin-bottom:0in;}

	{margin-bottom:0in;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633cc" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem G</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Power et al.</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>Finding the exponent of any
number can be very troublesome as it grows exponentially <span
style='font-family:Wingdings;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Wingdings'>J</span></span>.
But in this problem you will have to do a very simple task. Given two non-negative
numbers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>m </b>and <b>n</b>, you will
have to find the last digit of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>m</b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><sup><span style='font-size:14.0pt'>n</span></sup></b>
in decimal number system.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains less
than <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>100000</b> lines. Each line contains
two integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>m </b>and <b>n</b> (Less
than <b>10^101</b>). Input is terminated by a line containing two zeroes. This
line should not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>For each set of input you must
produce one line of output which contains a single digit. This digit is the
last digit of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>m</b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><sup><span style='font-size:14.0pt'>n</span></sup></b>.</p>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<h1><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">                               </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>2 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>2 5<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre
  style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>0 0</span></b><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=297 valign=top style='width:222.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>2</span><o:p></o:p></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<title>Problem H - Another Counting Problem
</title>

</style>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027">
  <o:colormru v:ext="edit" colors="#602000"/>
 </o:shapedefaults></xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]--><o:SmartTagType namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" name="country-region"/><o:SmartTagType namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" name="place"/>
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633cc" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Another Counting Problem</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Tree is an important data structure in Computer
Science. Of all trees we work with, Binary Tree is probably the most popular
one. A Binary Tree is called <b>Strictly Binary Tree</b> <i>if every nonleaf
node in a binary tree has nonempty left and right subtrees</i>. Let us define <b>a
Strictly Binary Tree of depth d</b>, as <i>a Strictly Binary Tree that has at
least one root to leaf path of length <b>d</b>, and no root to leaf path in
that tree is longer than <b>d</b></i>. So let us use a similar reasoning to
define a generalized structure. <span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>A n-ary Tree is called <b>Strictly n-ary Tree</b>
<i>if every nonleaf node in a n-ary tree has n children each</i>. <b>a Strictly
n-ary Tree of depth d</b>, then can be defined as <i>a Strictly n-ary Tree that
has at least one root to leaf path of length d, and no root to leaf path in
that tree is longer than d</i>. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Given the value of n and depth d, your task is to
<u>find the number of different strictly n-ary trees of depth d</u>. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>The figure below shows the 3 different strictly
binary trees of depth 2.</p>
<center><img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10516.jpg" ></center>


<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify'>Input consists
of several test cases. Each test case consists of two integers <b>n (0 &lt; n
&lt;= 32), d (0 &lt;= d &lt;= 16)</b>. Input is terminated a test case where
n=0 and d=0, you must not process this test case.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify'>For each test
case, print three integers, n, d and the number of different strictly n-ary
trees of level d, in a single line. There will be a single space in between two
integers of a line. <b>You can assume that you would not be asked about cases
where you had to consider trees that may have more than 2<sup>10</sup> nodes in
a level of the tree. You may also find it useful to know that the answer for
each test case will always fit in a 200 digit integer.</b></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>2 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt'>2 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>2 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt'>2 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>3 5<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt'>0 0</span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></pre></td>
  <td width=297 valign=top style='width:222.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt'>2 0 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>2 1 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt'>2 2 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>2 3 21<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt'>3 5 58871587162270592645034001</span><o:p></o:p></b></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span

<title>Problem I - Wind of Change!</title>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem I</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Wind of Change!</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><i><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Take
me to the magic of the moment<br>
On a glory night<br>
Where the children of tomorrow dream away<br>
In the wind of change<o:p></o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><i><span style='font-size:8.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>While advancing through the
tunnel of time we have observed that many of the peace processes have failed
just because the intension of many were only to show that they want peace
rather than actually establishing the peace itself. As some of the peace loving
people of the World look behind they discover that they were happier when there
were no engines, planes and other fuel driven machineries. All these have
happened because while science has progressed humanity has not. So now they
decide that they will all go back to the ancient stages, which means they will
not use any modern equipments. The only modern equipment they will use is a
computer (run by solar power). The <b>UN</b> has allotted a large area for them
(which does not have any natural resources other than animals and trees) to
live peacefully. These peace-loving peoples begin their new life with the hope that
no one will disturb them. These peoples do not have any atlas so the first
trouble they face is determining their own positions. The method they use to
determine their latitude is as the following:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Let the place whose latitude is
to be determined is <b>A</b>. They start from <b>A</b> and goes <b>n</b> km to
the north, then they go <b>n</b> km to the east, then they go <b>n</b> km to
the south and finally they go <b>m</b> km to the west to reach <b>A</b> again.
They find the latitude from the values of <b>m</b> and <b>n</b>. You can
assume:&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]>a)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>The
latitude of the place <b>A</b> is within <b>0</b> to 7<b>0</b> degree North.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]>b)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>The
value of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b> is less than <b>1001</b>
km.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of the input file
contains an integer <b>N (N&lt;=5000)</b> that indicates how many sets of
inputs are there.<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span>Each of the next <b>N</b>
lines makes a set of input. Each set contains two floating-point numbers <b>n</b>
and <b>m (n&lt;m)</b>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;<span style='font-size:
9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output<span
style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='color:black;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For each set of input you should produce one line of
output. This line contains the input serial number and then the latitude of </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:black'>A</span></b><span
style='color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> expressed in nearest degree,
minute and second as shown in the sample output. If the given input is invalid
or it is impossible to determine the latitude of </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='color:black'>A</span></b><span style='color:black;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> from the given data then print the line </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:black'>Invalid or
impossible.</span></b><span style='color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>
instead. An input is invalid when it violates any of the two assumptions above.
You can further assume that the earth is a perfect sphere, </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:black'>pi=2*cos<sup>-1</sup>(0)</span></b><span
style='color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> and the radius of earth is
exactly </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:black'>6378</span></b><span
style='color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> km.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
color:black'>&nbsp;</span></b><span style='font-size:2.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black'>Sample Input<span
style="mso-spacerun: yes">                               </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>100.0
  102.0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>150.0
  200.0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>1101.0 1102.0</span></b><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=297 valign=top style='width:222.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1: 51 deg 10 min 43 sec<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  2: Invalid or impossible.<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 3: Invalid or impossible.<span
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<p class=MsoCaption>Shahriar Manzoor</p>

<pre><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Monotype Corsiva";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><span style="mso-spacerun: yes"> </span><o:p></o:p></span></pre></div>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]--><o:SmartTagType namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" name="place"/><o:SmartTagType namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" name="PlaceName"/><o:SmartTagType namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" name="PlaceType"/>
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:.5in;
margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:18.0pt'>Problem J</span></b><br>
<b><span style='font-size:24.0pt'>How Many Calls?</span></b><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>standard input</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><br>
Output: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>standard output<span
style='color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:.5in;
margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:center'><b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt'>Time Limit:</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
18.0pt'> 5 seconds<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>The fibonacci number is defined by the following
recurrence: </p>

<ul type=disc>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'><b>fib(0)
     = 0 <o:p></o:p></b></li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'><b>fib(1) =
     1 <o:p></o:p></b></li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'><b>fib(n)
     = fib(n-1)+fib(n-2)</b> </li>
</ul>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>But we're not interested in the
fibonacci numbers here. We would like to know how many calls does it take to
evaluate the <b>n</b> th fibonacci number if we follow the given recurrence.
Since the numbers are going to be quite large, we'd like to make the job a bit
easy for you. We'd only need the last digit of the number of calls, when this
number is represented in base <b>b</b>. </p>

<h3 style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
13.5pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify'>Input consists
of several test cases. For each test you'd be given two integers <b>n (0 &lt;=
n &lt; 2<sup>63</sup>-1), b (0 &lt; b &lt;= 10000)</b>. Input is terminated by
a test case where <b>n=0</b> and <b>b=0</b>, you must not process this test
case.</p>

<h3 style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
13.5pt'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify'>For each test
case, print the test case number first. Then print <b>n</b>, <b>b</b> and the
last digit (in base <b>b</b>) of the number of calls. There would be a single
space in between the two numbers of a line. <i>Note that the last digit has to
be represented in decimal number system.</i></p>

<h3 style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
13.5pt'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<pre style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>0 100<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre style='text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>1 100<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre
style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>2 100<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre style='text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>3 100<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre
style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>10 10<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre style='text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>0 0</span></pre>

<h3 style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
13.5pt'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<pre style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Case 1: 0 100 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre style='text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Case 2: 1 100 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre
style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Case 3: 2 100 3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre style='text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Case 4: 3 100 5<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre
style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Case 5: 10 10 7<o:p></o:p></span></pre>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt'>Problemsetter:
Monirul Hasan</span></b></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

______________________________________________________
