	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Courier New";}
p.Preformatted, li.Preformatted, div.Preformatted
	{mso-style-name:Preformatted;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:none;
	tab-stops:0in 47.95pt 95.9pt 143.85pt 191.8pt 239.75pt 287.7pt 335.65pt 383.6pt 431.55pt 479.5pt;
	layout-grid-mode:char;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
span.StyleArial16pt
	{mso-style-name:"Style Arial 16 pt";
	mso-ansi-font-size:16.0pt;
	font-family:Arial;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
	mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
span.SpellE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-spl-e:yes;}
span.GramE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-gram-e:yes;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;
	margin:.8in .8in 67.7pt .8in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="2050"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Least Squares </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Time Limit: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>5 Seconds</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>You are given
an irregularly-shaped area on a grid that you must cover completely with
non-overlapping squares of various sizes.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>Doing this optimally (with the fewest number of squares) is
difficult.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><span class=GramE>Very
difficult.</span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Way too difficult for
your limited intelligence.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>So I won't
ask.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Why waste your time and mine?<o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Instead, your
much simpler task is merely to cover it with squares.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>That's it. Do you think you can handle
that?<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>I have some crayons you can
use.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>(Squares will be &quot;<span
class=SpellE>coloured</span>&quot; by filling them with capital letters, A to
Z)<o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Oh, make sure
that no touching squares have the same <span class=SpellE>colour</span>, so we
can tell them apart.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>(Touching means
sharing part of an edge; corners don't count)<o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Oh yes, and
I'd appreciate it if you'd give me the lexicographically first configuration
that satisfies this property.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><span
class=GramE>For simplicity's sake.</span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>(In other words, if every row of the solved grid is concatenated into
one string, give me the solution whose string would come first in a dictionary)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Every case
consists of a grid to fill with squares.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>The first line will contain m (0 &lt; m &lt;= 100), the number of rows
in the grid, and n (0 &lt; n &lt;= 80), the number of columns.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>The remaining m lines will consist of a
drawing of the area.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><span class=GramE>A
'?' represents a portion of the area to be filled, while a '.' represents a
boundary section of the grid that you should ignore.</span><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>There will be
at most 100 cases.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>The last case will be
followed by a line with two 0s.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>&nbsp;</p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each case,
output the desired <span class=SpellE>coloured</span> solution, in grid
format.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Separate the output of
consecutive cases with a blank line.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>5 <span class=SpellE>5</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>????.<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>???.?<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>?????<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>?????<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>????.<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span></span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>AAAB.<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>AAA.A<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>AAABB<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>BBCBB<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>BBAC.</span>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<title>Problem F - Paths through the Hourglass</title>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;

	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="6146"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem F</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Paths through the Hourglass</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Time Limit: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>2 Seconds</span></p>
<img width=427 height=456
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10564.gif"  align=left v:shapes="_x0000_s1029">
In the
hourglass to the right a path is marked. A path always starts at the first row
and ends at the last row. Each cell in the path (except the first) should be
directly below to the left or right of the cell in the path in the previous
row. The value of a path is the sum of the values in each cell in the path. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>A path is described with an integer representing
the starting point in the first row (the leftmost cell being <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0</b>) followed by a direction string
containing the letters <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>L</b> and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>R</b>, telling whether to go to the left or
right. For instance, the path to the right is described as <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>2 RRRLLRRRLR</b>. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Given the values of each cell in an hourglass as
well as an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i>S</i></b>,
calculate the number of distinct paths with value <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><i>S</i></b>. If at least one path <span class=GramE>exist</span>, you
should also print the path with the lowest starting point. If several such
paths exist, select the one which has the lexicographically smallest direction
string. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>The input contains several cases. Each case
starts with a line containing two integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>N</span></b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>S</span> (2&#8804;<span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>N</span>&#8804;20, 0&#8804;<span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>S</span>&lt;500)</b>, the number of cells in
the first row of the hourglass and the desired sum. Next follows <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2<span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>N</span>-1</b>
lines describing each row in the hourglass. Each line contains a space
separated list of integers between <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0</b>
and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>9</b> inclusive. The first of these
lines will contain <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>N</span></b> integers, then <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>N</span>-1<span
class=GramE>, ...,</span> 2, 1, 2, ..., <span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>N</span>-1,
<span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>N</span></b>. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>The input will terminate with <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>N</span>=<span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>S</span>=0</b>. This case should not be
processed. There will be less than <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>30</b>
cases in the input. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h1 style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>For each case, first output the number of distinct paths. If at least one
path <span class=GramE>exist</span>, output on the next line the description of
the path mentioned above. If no <span class=GramE>path exist</span>, output a
blank line instead.</span></h1>

<h1><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></h1>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;
color:black'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

	font-size:12.0pt;

	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	color:black;
	mso-font-kerning:0pt;
	font-weight:normal;
	font-style:italic;}
h2
	{mso-style-next:Normal;
	margin:0in;

	color:black;
	mso-bidi-font-weight:normal;}

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>

	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";

  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<h1 align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:4.0in'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Problem G<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<h2 align=center style='text-align:center'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Matrix<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<h3><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt'>Input:</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Output:</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> Standard Output</span><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Time Limit: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>2 Seconds</span><span
style='mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>[Preliminaries]</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>(He who has already studied linear algebra may skip this
part)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>A matrix is composed of n*n elements. Formally,</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='position:relative;top:34.0pt;mso-text-raise:
-34.0pt'>
<img width=167 height=99
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10565a.gif"  ></span>
<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span><span class=GramE>is</span>
an n*n matrix.</p>
<br><br>
<p class=MsoNormal><span class=GramE>for</span> example, <span
style='position:relative;top:15.0pt;mso-text-raise:-15.0pt'>
<img width=77 height=48
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10565a.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"></span>
<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>is a 2*2 matrix.</p>
<br><br>
<p class=MsoNormal>Two operations on matrices will be used in this problem:</p>
<br>
<p class=MsoNormal>1. A + k (A is an n*n matrix, k is an integer)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=GramE>all</span> the elements in the MAIN
diagonal is added by k. that is</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='position:relative;top:34.0pt;mso-text-raise:
-34.0pt'>
<img width=417 height=99
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10565a.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"></span>
</p>
<br><br>
<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>For example,</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='position:relative;top:15.0pt;mso-text-raise:
-15.0pt'>
<img width=135 height=48
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10565a.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"></span>
. A-k is defined A<span class=GramE>+(</span>-k), so <span
style='position:relative;top:15.0pt;mso-text-raise:-15.0pt'>
<img width=147 height=48
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10565a.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1029"></span>
</p>
<br><br>
<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>2. A*<span class=GramE>B (</span>both A and B are n*n
matrices), let</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=GramE></span><span style='position:relative;
top:34.0pt;mso-text-raise:-34.0pt'>
<img width=167 height=99
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10565a.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1030"></span>
, <span style='position:relative;top:34.0pt;mso-text-raise:
-34.0pt'>
<img width=163 height=99
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10565a.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1031"></span>
,</p>
<br><br><br>
<p class=MsoNormal><span class=GramE>and</span></p>
<p><span style='position:relative;
top:34.0pt;mso-text-raise:-34.0pt'>
<img width=215 height=99
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10565a.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1032"></span>
,</p>
<br><br>
<p class=MsoNormal><span class=GramE>then</span> we have:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='position:relative;top:14.0pt;mso-text-raise:
-14.0pt'>
<img width=267 height=45
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10565a.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1033"></span>
</p>
<br><br>
<p class=MsoNormal>For example,</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='position:relative;top:15.0pt;mso-text-raise:
-15.0pt'>
<img width=321 height=48
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10565a.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1034"></span>
</p>
<br><br>
<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Well, I have no time to explain why matrix multiplication is
defined like this. Please just remember it.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>[Problem]</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Find a matrix root of this equation:</p>
<br>
<p class=MsoNormal>(A + k<sub>1</sub>)(A+<span class=GramE>k<sub>2</sub></span>)(A+k<sub>3</sub>)<span
class=GramE>...(</span><span class=SpellE>A+k<sub>m</sub></span>) = O where k<sub>1</sub>,k<sub>2</sub>...k<sub>m</sub>
are distinct integers. </p>
<br>
<p class=MsoNormal>That is, EVERY ELEMENT OF the matrix computed from the left
is zero.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=GramE>for</span> example, </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='position:relative;top:15.0pt;mso-text-raise:
-15.0pt'>
<img width=77 height=48
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10565a.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1035"></span>
<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span><span class=GramE>is</span>
a matrix root of the equation(A+1)(A-5) = <span class=SpellE>O<span
style='font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-bidi-font-family:"MS Mincho"'>&#65292;</span>since</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='position:relative;top:15.0pt;mso-text-raise:
-15.0pt'>
<img width=405 height=48
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10565a.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1036"></span>
</p>
<br><br>
<p class=MsoNormal>It can be proven that there are infinitely many solutions,
however, I do not like trivial answer, so your answer must have at least
(n*n)/2 non-zero elements.</p>

<h4><span style='font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></h4>

<h4><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line contains the
number of tests <span class=GramE>t(</span>1&lt;=t&lt;=15). Each case contains
two lines. The first line contains an integer <span class=GramE>m(</span>1&lt;=m&lt;=30).
The second line contains m <span class=SpellE>integeres</span>, representing k<sub>1</sub><span
class=GramE>,k<sub>2</sub></span>...k<sub>m</sub> respectively. Absolute values
of the integers are no greater than 100.</p>

<h4><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></h4>

<h4><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, if no answer
can be found, print -1. <span class=GramE>otherwise</span> print n, indicating
that you found an n*n matrix root. <span class=GramE>the</span> following n
lines should be the matrix. It is guaranteed that if there is an answer, the
smallest possible n is not greater than 50, so your n should also NOT be
greater than 50. The absolute value of integers you gave should not be larger
than 1000.</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 -5<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>1 -5</span></b><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 3</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Problemsetter</b></span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>: <span class=SpellE>Rujia</span> Liu,
Member of Elite <span class=SpellE>Problemsetters</span>' Panel<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>Special thanks to Monirul Hasan<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

	{mso-style-next:Normal;

	{mso-margin-top-alt:auto;

	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	mso-outline-level:2;
	font-size:18.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	font-weight:bold;}
h3
	{mso-margin-top-alt:auto;
	margin-right:0in;
	mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
	margin-left:0in;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	mso-outline-level:3;
	font-size:13.5pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	font-weight:bold;}
p.MsoBodyText, li.MsoBodyText, div.MsoBodyText
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	text-align:justify;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	mso-layout-grid-align:none;
	text-autospace:none;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
a:link, span.MsoHyperlink
	{color:blue;
	text-decoration:underline;
	text-underline:single;}
a:visited, span.MsoHyperlinkFollowed
	{color:purple;
	text-decoration:underline;
	text-underline:single;}
p
	{mso-margin-top-alt:auto;
	margin-right:0in;
	mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
	margin-left:0in;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
pre
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
tt
	{font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-ascii-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";}
span.StyleArial16pt
	{mso-style-name:"Style Arial 16 pt";
	mso-ansi-font-size:16.0pt;
	font-family:Arial;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
	mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
span.SpellE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-spl-e:yes;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;
	margin:.7in .8in .7in .8in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;

</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Crossed Ladders</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Time Limit: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>1 Second<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><a
name=SECTION0001001000000000000000>A narrow street is lined with tall
buildings. An <i>x</i> foot long ladder is rested at the base of the building
on the right side of the street and leans on the building on the left side. A <i>y</i>
foot long ladder is rested at the base of the building on the left side of the
street and leans on the building on the right side. The point where the two
ladders cross is exactly <i>c</i> feet from the ground. How wide is the street?
</a></p>
<center>
<img width=304 height=250
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10566.gif"  ></center>

<p style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001001000000000000000'>Each
line of input contains three positive floating point numbers giving the values
of <i>x</i>, <i>y</i>, and <i>c</i>. </span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001001000000000000000'>For
each line of input, output one line with a floating point number giving the
width of the street in feet, with three decimal digits in the fraction. </span></p>

<span style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001001000000000000000'></span>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>30 40 10<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>12.619429 8.163332 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>10 <span
  class=SpellE>10</span> 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>10 <span class=SpellE>10</span> 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>26.033<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>7.000<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>8.000<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>9.798<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=EN
style='color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>

style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Problemsetter</span></b></span><b

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";

	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;

	font-family:"Times New Roman";}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="10242"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem A</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Helping Fill Bates</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Time Limit: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>10 Seconds<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN style='color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN style='color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Everyone knows Fill Bates but I guess fewer people
know that he was famous in his high school days for a different reason. I just
put below the exact lines from one of his short biographies:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN style='color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:48.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Before high-school graduation, Bates was
renowned for designing the class scheduling software that placed him in a class
full of girls. With his present success, those girls are probably mutilating
themselves for not buying in on an early investment.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:48.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:12.25pt;text-align:justify'>Now you are
to help him with a completely different purpose. His company has initiated a
talent search program in QSA. It has 52 states (the original 50 states plus the
two recent troublesome additions <span class=SpellE>Oraq</span> and <span
class=SpellE>Malistan</span>). The candidates from the 52 states are given a
state identity and a serial number (The serial number is unique). The state
identities for the 52 states are the 52 ASCII characters A<span class=GramE>..</span>Z
and <span class=SpellE>a<span class=GramE>..</span>z</span>. The talent search
process is a bit strange. At most 1 million candidates stand in a single line
according to the increasing order their serial number (Starting with 0 and then
1, 2, 3 
etc) with a placard showing only their state identity (After all who
wants to hire employees from <span class=SpellE>Oraq</span> and <span
class=SpellE>Malistan</span>). Mr. Fill Gates then writes a sequence of
characters (Only alphabets). If candidates are found in that order of states
with increasing serial numbers (Some candidates may be skipped for this
purpose) then those candidates are taken. Other wise an appropriate message is
given.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><a name=SECTION0001001000000000000000><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></a></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001001000000000000000'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><a
name=SECTION0001002000000000000000><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>The input file contains only one set of
input. First line of the input file contains a string S containing only
alphabets. The length of this string is at most 1000000. The next line contains
an integer Q (0&lt;Q&lt;3501) which indicates the number of queries. Each of
the next Q lines contain one string SS of length less than 101. These strings
are the strings written by Fill Bates. <o:p></o:p></span></span></a></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001002000000000000000'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001002000000000000000'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output</span></span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>For each query you should output one line. If
candidates are not found in the order written by Fill Bates then you should
output a string Not matched (Without the quotes), otherwise you should print
Matched  (Note that an space is printed after Matched) and then the serial
of the first candidate in the subsequence and the serial of the last candidate
of the subsequence. These two integers should be separated by a single space.
If there is more than one such subsequence then choose the one which has
smallest starting serial number. If there is a tie choose the one with the
smallest ending serial number.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                        </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                   </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  class=SpellE><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>aaaaaaaaaaaaaabbbbbbbbbdddddddddddccccccccccccc</span></b></span><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa</span></b></span><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>aaaaaaaaaaabbbbbbbbbbbc</span></b></span><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>abccc</span></b></span><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Not matched<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Not matched<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Matched 0 36<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=EN
style='color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>

<pre><span class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Problemsetter</span></b></span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>: Shahriar Manzoor, Member of Elite <span class=SpellE>Problemsetters</span>' Panel <o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b

"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></div>

<!--
var mUpTime=new Date(0);
RealOpenWindow = window.open ;
function RecordMUpTime(){mUpTime = new Date();}
function MyWndOpen(url,name,attribute)
{
	if(mUpTime)
	{
		var openTime=new Date();
		openTime.setTime(openTime.getTime()-mUpTime.getTime());
		if ( openTime.getSeconds() < 2 )
			return(RealOpenWindow(url,name,attribute));
	}
}
function NoError(){return(true);}
function moveTo(){return true;}
function resizeTo(){return true;}
onerror=NoError;
window.open=MyWndOpen;
//-->

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>n Group k</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Time Limit: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>3<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> Seconds<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><a name=SECTION0001001000000000000000>Professor X
would like to give a term assignment to his students. This would be a group
task, and he wants to form the groups himself. In his class of N students, he
wants each group to have exactly K students. Here at most one group can have
less than K students when it would be impossible for all the groups to have
exactly K students. </a><span style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001001000000000000000'><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001001000000000000000'>The
good thing about X's students is that they do not have any preference or any
objection about the groups that the professor would form. But that is actually
the problem for the professor: he has got too many options open for him. Your
task would be to aid the professor in two types of query: </span></p>

<ol start=1 type=1>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l0 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'><span style='mso-bookmark:
     SECTION0001001000000000000000'>COUNT N K: <i>Count the number of ways the
     groups can be formed.</i> </span></li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l0 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'><span style='mso-bookmark:
     SECTION0001001000000000000000'>GENERATE N K: <i>Generate the complete list
     of ways the groups can be formed.</i> </span></li>
</ol>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001001000000000000000'>Let
A be a possible solution, then A would be a set of Ceiling(n/k) groups. One
student can be a member of exactly one group in A. And you should also notice
that two different placement orders of the same students in a group are
considered to be the same. In other words, the task is about generating the set
of all possible A's or to count how many A's are possible.</span><span
style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001001000000000000000'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001001000000000000000'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001001000000000000000'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><a name=SECTION0001002000000000000000>There can be at most
1200 test cases. Each test case starts with a string &quot;GENERATE&quot;, or
&quot;COUNT&quot; followed by two integers N and K. For the
&quot;GENERATE&quot; queries you can assume 1 &lt;= N, K &lt;= 15 and for the
&quot;COUNT&quot; queries, 1 &lt;= N, K &lt;= 30. The end of the test cases is
denoted with a &quot;END&quot; string as shown in the sample output.</a><span
style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001002000000000000000'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001002000000000000000'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:SECTION0001002000000000000000'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output</span></span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='mso-layout-grid-align:auto;text-autospace:ideograph-other'>For
each of the &quot;COUNT&quot; queries, output an integer in one line giving the
total number of solutions. You can assume that the output will always fit in a
64bit unsigned integer. For each of the &quot;GENERATE&quot; queries, output
the total number of solutions, followed by that many number of lines. In each
of those lines you are to print the groups. The professor has assigned the
first N letters (uppercase) of the english alphabet to his N students. In each
group the students are to be listed in alphabetic order and all the groups in a
solution are to be sorted in ascending order. You have to use a single space to
<i>separate</i> two groups in a solution. The solutions themselves have to be
sorted in lexicographic order (to be more specific, you can use the ASCII
values to do the comparison). Because of the sorting criterion the output will
always be unique. You can assume that the number of solutions printed for each
of the &quot;GENERATE&quot; queries will not be more than 10000 lines and
collectively the solutions printed for all the &quot;GENERATE&quot; queries
will not be more than 30000 lines.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='mso-layout-grid-align:auto;text-autospace:ideograph-other'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:8.5pt'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:8.5pt'><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>COUNT 4 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>GENERATE 4 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>END</span><o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:8.5pt'><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>A BCD<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>ABC D<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>ABD C<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>ACD
  B<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=EN
style='color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>

<pre><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Problemsetter: Monirul Hasan, </span></b><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Member of Elite Problemsetters' Panel<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Special thanks to Derek Kisman<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre
style='text-align:center'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&quot;What was lost was found; what was found was never lost.&quot;<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>&nbsp;</p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<h1 align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:4.0in'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Problem </span></b><b><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN;font-style:normal'>C<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<h2 align=center style='text-align:center'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Number Theory<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<h3 align=center style='text-align:center'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input:</span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt'> </span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;font-weight:normal;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Input</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Output:</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> Standard Output</span><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Time Limit: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>1<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> Second<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Given a positive integer <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b>, you are to find am integer <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>f</b>, such that:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>f<sup>3</sup>
= a<sub>1</sub><sup>3</sup> + a<sub>2</sub><sup>3 </sup>+ 
 + a<sub>n</sub><sup>3</sup><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=GramE><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>where</span></span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> all <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>a</i><sub>1</sub>, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>a</i><sub>2</sub>, ..., <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>a</i><sub>n</sub>
are distinct positive integers.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>For example, <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=GramE><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>if</span></span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b> = 3, one valid <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>f</b> is 71, since <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>71<sup>3</sup>=14<sup>3</sup>+23<sup>3</sup>+70<sup>3</sup>=357911</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=GramE><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>if</span></span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b> = 4, one valid <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>f</b> is 100, since <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>100<sup>3</sup>=56<sup>3</sup>+58<sup>3</sup>+67<sup>3</sup>+69<sup>3</sup>=1000000</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='color:windowtext;
mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='color:windowtext;
mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Your number f may be big, but it has at most <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>250</b> digits.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='color:windowtext;
mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='color:windowtext'>The
first line contains the number of tests <span class=GramE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>t(</b></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1&lt;=t&lt;=</b></span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:windowtext;mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'>20</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='color:windowtext'>)</span></b><span style='color:windowtext'>. Each case
contains</span><span style='color:windowtext;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> a
single</span><span style='color:windowtext'> line</span><span style='color:
windowtext;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> with a positive integer <span
class=GramE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b>(</span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1</b>&lt;=<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>n</b>&lt;=<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>100</b>)</span><span
style='color:windowtext'>. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:18.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='color:windowtext'>For each test case, print the case number and</span><span
style='color:windowtext;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>n</b>+<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1</b> numbers: <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>f</b>, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>a</i><sub>1</sub>,
<span class=GramE><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>a</i><sub>2</sub>, ...<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>a<sub>n</sub></i></span>. If no <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>f</b> exists, print a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>-1</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n </b>zeros.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  color:windowtext;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  color:windowtext;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  color:windowtext;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  color:windowtext;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>Case
  1: </span></b><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>71 14
  23 70<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:

  class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext;
  mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Case 3: 100 56 58 67 69<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>

<p class=MsoCaption style='tab-stops:.5in 45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Problem idea, statement, solution provider: <span
class=SpellE>Rujia</span> Liu, Member of Elite <span class=SpellE>Problemsetters</span>'
Panel<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Problem Solution and
Special Judge: <span class=SpellE>Monirul</span> <span class=SpellE>Hasan</span>,
Member of Elite <span class=SpellE>Problemsetters</span>' Panel<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]--><o:SmartTagType namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" name="State"/><o:SmartTagType namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" name="place"/>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=blue style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Meeting with Aliens</span></b><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:
</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Time Limit: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>3 Seconds<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The aliens are in an important
meeting just before landing on the earth. All the aliens sit around a round
table during the meeting. Aliens are numbered sequentially from 1 to <b>N</b>.
It's a precondition of the meeting that i'th alien will sit between (i-1)'th and
(i+1)'th alien. 1st alien will sit between 2nd and N'th alien.</p>
<center>
<img width=635 height=241
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10570.jpg" ></center>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'>Though the ordering of aliens are fixed but their positions
are not fixed. In the above figure two valid sitting arrangements of eight
aliens are shown. Right before the start of the meeting the aliens sometimes
face a common problem of not maintaining the proper order. This occurs as no
alien has a fixed position. Two maintain the proper order, two aliens can
exchange their positions. The aliens want to know the minimum number of
exchange operations necessary to fix the order. <span style='font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input will start with a positive
integer, <b>N (3&lt;=N&lt;=500)</b> the number of aliens. In next few lines
there will be N distinct integers from <b>1</b> to <b>N</b> indicating the
current ordering of aliens. Input is terminated by a case where <b>N=0</b>.
This case should not be processed. There will be not more than <b>100</b>
datasets.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'>For each set of input print the minimum exchange operations
required to fix the ordering of aliens.<span style='font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1><span style='font-family:Arial;color:black'>Sample Input<span
style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span
style="mso-spacerun:
yes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=343 valign=top style='width:257.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre>4</pre><pre>1 2 3 4</pre><pre>4</pre><pre>4 3 2 1</pre><pre>4</pre><pre>2 3 1 4</pre><pre>0</pre><pre><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=273 valign=top style='width:204.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre>0</pre><pre>0</pre><pre>1</pre><pre><b>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<p class=MsoCaption>Problemsetter: <st1:State><st1:place>Md.</st1:place></st1:State>
Kamruzzaman, <span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Member of Elite
Problemsetters' Panel</span> </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Special thanks to
Derek Kisman<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&#8220;That's a good
panel.&nbsp; You'll have to lean on Kisman and Mardell to make<br>
sure that mere mortals can solve them.&#8221;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=right style='text-align:right'>-Prof. G. V. Cormack on
Elite Problemsetters&#8217; Panel </p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

	tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
