 .5pt solid windowtext;
 mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Problem A<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Tahoma'>Area</span></b><b><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Tahoma'>Time Limit<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'>4 Seconds<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2>Measuring the area of a certain shape is an important
part of certain geometric problems. When the shape becomes complex it often
becomes very difficult to measure the area of that geometric shape. In some of
these cases some randomized algorithms helps us immensely to find the area
roughly. In this problem we will find such an area with randomized algorithm.</p>
<p><center>
<img width=372 height=333 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10589.jpg" >
</center></p>

<br style='mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=ALL>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Look at the picture above. <b>ABCD</b>
is a square whose sides are <b>a</b>. A circle is drawn (1/4 th of a circle I
should say) considering <b>A</b> as its center. Its radius is <b>a</b>. Three
similar circles are drawn considering <b>B</b>, <b>C</b>, <b>D</b> as centers.
Using an algorithm based on random numbers (The random number generator may be
biased) you will have to find the area of the striped region. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The idea is that you will be
given <b>N</b> pairs of random coordinates within the rectangle. If <b>M</b> of
them are within the striped region then the approximate area of the striped
region <b>A = (M*a<sup>2</sup>/N)</b>. You are to find the approximate area using this
concept.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains several
sets of inputs. The description of each set is given below.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of each set
contains two integers <b>N</b> (<b>N</b> can always be written in the form <b>10^k</b>,
where <b>k</b> is a non-negative integer less than <b>6</b>), <b>a</b> <b>(100&gt;a&gt;=10)</b>.
Each of the next <b>N</b> lines contains two floating-point numbers, which
indicates the coordinate of a point. These floating-point numbers always have
seven digits after the decimal point and the coordinates are always within the
rectangle. Points just on the boundaries of the striped region are considered
within the striped region. Points just outside are considered out of the
striped region and vice versa. Assume that the lower left corner of the
rectangle is <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>(0, 0)</b> and top right
corner is <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>(a, a)</b> as shown in the
figure above.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input is terminated by a set
whose <b>N</b> is zero.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each of input you should
produce one line of output. This line should contain the area of the striped
region according to the formula specified above. Your answer must be exact and
no floating-point errors will be tolerated. That means precision of calculation
must be infinite or precision error must be zero. Output numbers should always
have five digits after the decimal point.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>1 10<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>5.0000000 5.0000000<o:p></o:p></span></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>0 0</span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>100.00000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='border:none;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .75pt;
padding:0in;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>Problemsetter: Shahriar
Manzoor<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>Member of Elite
Problemsetters' Panel<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:36.0pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Problem B<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Tahoma'>Boxes of Chocolates Again</span></b><b><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Tahoma'>Time Limit<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'>4 Seconds<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Little <span class=SpellE><i>Pippy</i></span>
has got again a big bunch of boxes of chocolates on her 7<sup>th</sup>
birthday. Her parents are anxious about the health of her teeth, so they have
allowed her to take only a limited number of chocolates; <span class=GramE>lets</span>
call this number <b>N</b>. They know that <i>Pippy</i> always shares her
belongings with her friends, so they have fixed a sufficiently large number to
make sure that all are happy. The chocolates are packed in several types of
boxes. Each type of box contains a certain number of chocolates which is
written above the box. Boxes of different types contain different numbers of
chocolates. If a box contains <b>k</b> chocolate(s) we will call it <b>type-k</b>
box. Now <i>Pippy</i> should take exactly <b>N</b> chocolates without tearing
apart any box. Your job is to determine in how many ways <i>Pippy</i> can do
this. You may assume that there are infinitely many boxes of each type from <b>type-1</b>
to <b>type-N</b>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For example, <span class=GramE>lets</span>
assume that <i>Pippy</i> has been asked to take 3 chocolates. She can take only
one type-3 box or she can take one type-2 box and one type-1 box or she can
take 3 type-1 boxes.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>There will be several lines as
input each containing a candidate <b>N</b> as described above. <b>N</b> can be
any nonnegative number less than or equal to <b>5000</b>. It may look like that
<b>N</b> is very big for a little 7 year old girl; but remember she has <i>lots</i>
of friends. And, who knows, may be you are one of her friends!</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each <b>N</b>, print an
integer on a single line indicating the number of ways <i>Pippy</i> can take <b>N</b>
chocolates.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>3</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>4</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>5</p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>3</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>5</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>7</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='border:none;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .75pt;
padding:0cm;mso-padding-alt:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>Problemsetter: Tanveer
Ahsan<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>International Islamic
University </span></b><st1:City><st1:place><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>Chittagong</span></b></st1:place></st1:City><b><span
style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:36.0pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Problem C<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Tahoma'>Happy Number</span></b><b><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Tahoma'>Time Limit<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'>1 Second<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Let the sum of the square of the
digits of a positive integer <b>S<sub>0</sub></b> be represented by <b>S<sub>1</sub></b><sub>.</sub>
In a similar way, let the sum of the squares of the digits of <b>S<sub>1</sub></b>
be represented by <b>S<sub>2</sub></b> and so on. If <span class=SpellE><b>S<sub>i</sub></b></span>
= 1 for some <span class=SpellE><b>i</b></span> <span style='font-family:Symbol;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:
symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>³</span></span> 1, then the original
integer <b>S<sub>0</sub></b> is said to be Happy number. A number, which is not
happy, is called <span class=GramE>Unhappy</span> number. For example 7 is a
Happy number since 7 -&gt; 49 -&gt; 97 -&gt; 130 -&gt; 10 -&gt; 1 and 4 is an
Unhappy number since 4 -&gt; 16 -&gt; 37 -&gt; 58 -&gt; 89 -&gt; 145 -&gt; 42 -&gt;
20 -&gt; 4.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input consists of several
test cases, the number of which you are given in the first line of the input.
Each test case consists of one line containing a single positive integer <b>N</b>
smaller than <b>10<sup>9</sup></b>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, you must
print one of the following messages: </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
#p: N is a <span class=GramE>Happy</span> number.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
#p: N is an <span class=GramE>Unhappy</span> number. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Here <b>p</b> stands for the case
number (starting from 1). You should print the first message if the number <b>N</b>
is a happy number. Otherwise, print the second line.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>7<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>13</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case #1: 7 is a
  Happy number.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case #2: 4 is an
  Unhappy number.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case #3: 13 is a
  Happy number.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;border:none;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0cm;mso-padding-alt:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>Problemsetter:
Mohammed Shamsul Alam<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>International
Islamic University </span></b><st1:City><st1:place><b><span style='font-family:
  Tahoma'>Chittagong</span></b></st1:place></st1:City><b><span
style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>Special
thanks to Muhammad Abul Hasan<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-gram-e:yes;}
@page Section1
	{size:612.0pt 792.0pt;
	margin:72.0pt 72.0pt 72.0pt 72.0pt;
	mso-header-margin:36.0pt;
	mso-footer-margin:36.0pt;
	mso-header:url("p3_files/header.htm") h1;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3074"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:36.0pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Problem D<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Tahoma'>Freedom Fighter</span></b><b><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Tahoma'>Time Limit<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'>5 Seconds<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><st1:country-region><st1:place>Bangladesh</st1:place></st1:country-region>
became independent in <st1:date Year="1971" Day="16" Month="12">16<sup>th</sup>
 December 1971</st1:date> after more than two decades of struggle and with a
nine month long war. This war is often referred to as the Liberation War.
During the liberation war <st1:country-region><st1:place>Bangladesh</st1:place></st1:country-region>
was divided into 11 sectors. Every sector was under the control of a sector
commander who directed the freedom fighter. Most of the sector also had some
opponent soldiers. In that time, the sector commander faced a serious problem.
They were not being able to count accurately how many freedom fighters and
opponent groups were there in each sector and also how many groups are still in
fighting. According to this information all sector commander will make a
decision about their future planning. They took the help of a programmer during
that time. The programmer solved the problem and played a vital role in proper
planning of the war. 32 years have passed since the glorious Liberation War of
Bangladesh. As a programmer, you are committed to find again a way of solving
the problem.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<center>
<img width=444 height=212
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10592.gif" >
</center>
<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In the figure the area bordered
by a rectangle indicates a sector. In the input to your program a sector may
contain any of the three characters <b>*</b>, <b>B</b>, <b>P</b>. Here <b>B</b>
indicates the locations where there are some freedom fighters, <b>P</b>
indicates the places occupied by enemy forces and the locations occupied by
none of them are identified by some <b>*</b>. In a sector all the <b>B</b>, <b>P</b>
or <b>*</b> are connected either horizontally or vertically. Within a sector
there may be one or more freedom fighter group or enemy group. Each of the
freedom fighter groups will be identified by some <b>B</b> connected to another
vertically or horizontally. Similarly enemy groups will be identified by the
character <b>P</b>. No two sectors will have a connection either horizontally
or vertically. There may be <span class=GramE>some <b>.</b></span> (<span
class=GramE>dots</span>) to separate two sectors. In the above picture we can
see that there are two (2) groups in a sector. If a group is horizontally or
vertically connected to an opponent group then this two groups are said to be in
fighting position. It is granted that a freedom fighter group can fight only
one opponent group at a time.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>There will be several test cases. The
input of each test case starts with a single integer <b>n</b> (<b>5 &#8804; n
&#8804; 50</b>). A 0 for the value of <b>n</b> indicates the end of input. The
next <b>n</b> lines consist of a description of <b>n x n</b> grid. Each line
will have <b>n</b> characters which will be either of <b>.</b> , <b>*</b> , <b>B</b>
and <b>P</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:
EN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span lang=EN
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Tahoma;mso-ansi-language:EN'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>For each set of input, output as many
lines as the number of sectors detailing the number of freedom fighter groups
and enemy groups. The last line of the input will indicate how many groups are
in fighting position. The sectors are numbered according to the position of the
top left corner in row major order. Print a blank line after each test case. For
exact format of input and output see the sample output below.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:
EN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=643
 style='width:482.4pt;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=643 valign=top style='width:482.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=643 valign=top style='width:482.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'><pre><tt>16<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><tt>................<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><tt>................<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><tt>.******.........<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><span
  class=GramE><tt>.*</tt></span><tt>*PP**....***..<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><span
  class=GramE><tt>.*</tt></span><tt>*****....*B*..<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><tt>.******....***..<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><span
  class=GramE><tt>.*</tt></span><tt>*BB**.........<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><tt>.******.........<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><tt>................<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><tt>.....*******....<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><tt>....*BB**BB**...<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><tt>....*BB**PP**...<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><tt>....*********...<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><tt>....****PP***...<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><tt>.....*******....<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><tt>................<o:p></o:p></tt></pre><pre><tt>0</tt></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=643
 style='width:482.4pt;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=643 valign=top style='width:482.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=643 valign=top style='width:482.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'><pre style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN
  style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>Sector #1: contain 1 freedom fighter group(s) &amp; 1 enemy group(s)<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre
  style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>Sector #2: contain 1 freedom fighter group(s) &amp; 0 enemy group(s)<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre
  style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>Sector #3: contain 2 freedom fighter group(s) &amp; 2 enemy group(s)<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre
  style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>Total 2 group(s) are in fighting position.<o:p></o:p></span></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;border:none;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0cm;mso-padding-alt:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

S. A. M. <span class=SpellE>Harun</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:36.0pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Problem E<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Tahoma'>Kites<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Tahoma'>Time Limit<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'>4 Seconds<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The season of flying kites is
well ahead. So what? Let us make an inventory for kites. We are given a square
shaped sheet of paper. But many parts of this are already porous. Your
challenge here is to count the total number of ways to cut a kite of any size
from this sheet. By the way, the kite itself can't be porous :-)
AND..................it must be either square shaped or diamond shaped.</p>

<pre><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></pre><pre><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                        </span><span
class=GramE>x</span></pre><pre><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>           </span><span
class=GramE>x</span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>           </span>xxx<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>           </span><span
class=SpellE>xxx</span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>         </span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><span
class=SpellE>xxx</span></pre><pre><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>          </span><span
class=GramE>xxx</span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>         </span><span
class=SpellE>xxxxx</span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>          </span>xxx<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>           </span><span
class=SpellE>x.x</span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>         </span>x</pre><pre><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>           </span><span
class=GramE>x</span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>           </span>xxx<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>           </span><span
class=SpellE>xxx</span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>           </span><span
class=SpellE>xxx</span></pre><pre><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                        </span><span
class=GramE>x</span></pre>

<p class=MsoNormal>In the above figure first three are valid kites but not next
two.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input contains an integer <b>n</b>
(<b>n</b> &#8804; 500), which is the size of the sheet. Then follows <b>n</b>
lines each of which has <b>n</b> characters ('x' or '.'). Here the dotted parts
resemble the porous parts of the sheet. Input is terminated by <b><i>end of
file</i></b>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Output is very simple. Only print
an <b><i>integer</i></b> according to the problem statement for each test case
in a new line.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;

 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>4<br>
  .xx.</span></span><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><br>
  <span class=SpellE><span class=GramE>xxxx</span></span><br>
  .xx.<br>
  .x..<br>
  3<br>
  xxx<br>
  xxx<br>
  xxx<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>4</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>6</p>
  </td>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0cm;mso-padding-alt:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'><b><span

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:36.0pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Problem F<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Tahoma'>Data Flow</span></b><b><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Tahoma'>Time Limit<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'>5 Seconds<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>In the latest Lab of IIUC, it requires to send huge amount
of data from the local server to the terminal server. The lab setup is not yet
ready. It requires <span class=GramE>to write</span> a router program for the
best path of data. The problem is all links of the network has a fixed capacity
and cannot flow more than that amount of data. Also it takes certain amount of
time to send one unit data through the link. To avoid the collision at a time
only one data unit can travel i.e. at any instant more than one unit of data
cannot travel parallel through the network. This may be time consuming but it
certainly gives no collision. Each node has sufficient buffering capability so
that data can be temporarily stored there. IIUC management wants the shortest
possible time to send all the data from the local server to the final one.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
<center><img width=467 height=359
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10594.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025">
</center>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For example, in the above network
if anyone wants to send 20 unit data from A to D, he will send 10 unit data
through AD link and then 10 unit data through AB-BD link which will take
10+70=80 unit time. <span style='color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each input starts with two
positive integers <b>N (2 </b>&#8804; <b>N </b>&#8804; <b>100), M (1 </b>&#8804;
<b>M </b>&#8804; <b>5000)</b>. In next few lines the link and corresponding
propagation time will be given. The links are bidirectional and there will be
at most one link between two network nodes. In next line there will be two
positive integers <b>D, K</b> where <b>D</b> is the amount of data to be
transferred from 1<sup>st</sup> to <span class=SpellE><b>N</b>'th</span> node
and <b>K</b> is the link capacity. Input is terminated by EOF.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each dataset, print the
minimum possible time in a line to send all the data. If it is not possible to
send all the data, print &quot;Impossible.&quot;. The time can be as large as
10<sup>15</sup>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'><pre>4 5</pre><pre>1 4 1</pre><pre>1 3 <span
  class=SpellE>3</span></pre><pre>3 4 <span class=SpellE>4</span></pre><pre>1 2 <span
  class=SpellE>2</span></pre><pre>2 4 5</pre><pre>20 10</pre><pre>4 <span
  class=SpellE>4</span></pre><pre>1 3 <span class=SpellE>3</span></pre><pre>3 4 <span
  class=SpellE>4</span></pre><pre>1 2 <span class=SpellE>2</span></pre><pre>2 4 5</pre><pre>20 100</pre><pre>4 <span
  class=SpellE>4</span></pre><pre>1 3 <span class=SpellE>3</span></pre><pre>3 4 <span
  class=SpellE>4</span></pre><pre>1 2 <span class=SpellE>2</span></pre><pre>2 4 5</pre><pre>20 1</pre></td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'><pre>80</pre><pre>140</pre><pre>Impossible.</pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='border:none;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .75pt;
padding:0cm;mso-padding-alt:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'><b><span style='font-family:
Tahoma'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>Problemsetter: </span></b><st1:State><st1:place><b><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'>Md.</span></b></st1:place></st1:State><b><span
style='font-family:Tahoma'> Kamruzzaman<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>Member of Elite <span
class=SpellE>Problemsetters</span>' Panel<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:36.0pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Problem G<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Tahoma'>Knight on the Bee Board</span></b><b><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Tahoma'>Time Limit<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'>3 Seconds<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The bee board consists of many
hexagons instead of square of a chessboard. The other difference is chessboard
has only 64 squares. But the bee board may have as many as 10000 hexagons. The
main thing is choosing an arbitrary hexagon as number 1 hexagon of the board.
And other hexagons are numbered sequentially clockwise direction. A knight acts
as a regular knight that used in chess game but it can move 12 different
directions. For example from cell number 1 the knight can move to cell number
20, 21, 23, 24, 26, 27, 29, 30, 32, 33, 35 and 36.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
<center>
<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:174pt;
 height:234.75pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10595.png"  o:title="2DBLUBRD"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=232 height=313
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10595.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                 </span><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:190.5pt;height:207.75pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10595.png"  o:title="p808"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=254 height=277
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/105/p10595.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></p>



<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>        </span>General chessboard<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                                              
</span>Bee board<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>               </span><o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input consists of several
test cases. The first line of every test case consists of two <span
class=GramE>integers</span> <b><span style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>N &#8804; 10000</span></b> and <b>M </b><b><span style='font-size:13.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>&#8804; </span>N</b>. <b>N</b> indicates the number
of cells in bee board. <b>M</b> indicates the number of obstacles. The next <b>M</b>
lines contain the cell number that contains the obstacle. The knight cannot
move to this cell. The last line of the input case contains two integers the
source and destination of the knight. A blank line will follow each test case.
You must read until <b>EOF.</b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case output a line
consists of an integer that indicate the minimum step to reach from source to
destination if it is possible to reach source to destination otherwise print <b>Impossible.</b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>70 2</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>5</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>1</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>14 2</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>70 2</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>5</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>1</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>14 2</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>1</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>1</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='border:none;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .75pt;
padding:0cm;mso-padding-alt:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>Problemsetter</span></b></span><b><span

  style='font-family:Tahoma'>Md.</span></b></st1:place></st1:State><b><span

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>International Islamic
University </span></b><st1:City><st1:place><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>Chittagong</span></b></st1:place></st1:City><b><span

	{margin:0cm;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;

	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}

	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;

	mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}

	{mso-margin-top-alt:auto;
	margin-right:0cm;
	mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
	margin-left:0cm;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;

	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}

	{margin:0cm;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Courier New";}

	{mso-style-parent:" ;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-ascii-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";}
span.SpellE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-spl-e:yes;}

	{size:612.0pt 792.0pt;

	mso-footer-margin:36.0pt;
	mso-header:url("p7_files/header.htm") h1;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>

	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;

  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:36.0pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Problem H<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign=top style='width:76.32%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Tahoma'>Morning Walk</span></b><b><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Tahoma'>Time Limit<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign=top style='width:76.32%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'>3 Seconds<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=SpellE>Kamal</span>
is a <span class=SpellE><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Motashota</i></span>
guy. He has got a new job in <st1:City><st1:place>Chittagong</st1:place></st1:City>.
So, he has moved to <st1:City><st1:place>Chittagong</st1:place></st1:City> from
<span class=SpellE>Dinajpur</span>. He was getting fatter in <span
class=SpellE>Dinajpur</span> as he had no work in his hand there. So, moving to
<st1:City><st1:place>Chittagong</st1:place></st1:City> has turned to be a
blessing for him. Every morning he takes a walk through the hilly roads of
charming city <st1:City><st1:place>Chittagong</st1:place></st1:City>. He is
enjoying this city very much. There are so many roads in <st1:City><st1:place>Chittagong</st1:place></st1:City>
and every morning he takes different paths for his walking. But while choosing
a path he makes sure he does not visit a road twice not even in his way back
home. An intersection point of a road is not considered as the part of the
road. In a sunny morning, he was thinking about how it would be if he could
visit all the roads of the city in a single walk. Your task is to help <span
class=SpellE>Kamal</span> in determining whether it is possible for him or not.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input will consist of several
test cases. Each test case will start with a line containing two numbers. The
first number indicates the number of road intersections and is denoted by <b>N</b>
(<b>2 &#8804; N &#8804; 200</b>). The road intersections are assumed to be
numbered from <b>0</b> to <b>N-1</b>. The second number <b>R</b> denotes the
number of roads (<b>0 &#8804; R &#8804; 10000</b>). Then there will be <b>R</b>
lines each containing two numbers <b>c<sub>1</sub></b> and <b>c<sub>2</sub></b>
indicating the intersections connecting a road.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Print a single line containing
the text <b>Possible</b> without quotes if it is possible for <span
class=SpellE>Kamal</span> to visit all the roads exactly once in a single walk
otherwise print <b>Not Possible</b>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2 <span
  class=SpellE>2</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>0 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>0 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Possible<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Not Possible<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='border:none;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .75pt;
padding:0cm;mso-padding-alt:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

Abul Hasan<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>International Islamic

 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:36.0pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Problem I<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Tahoma'>Right Words<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="23%" valign=top style='width:23.68%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Tahoma'>Time Limit<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="100%" valign=top style='width:100.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-family:Tahoma'>2 Seconds<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>A Context Free Grammar (CFG)
consists of the followings: a set of <i>nonterminal</i> symbols <b>V</b>; a set
of <i>terminal</i> symbols <b>T</b>; a special <i>nonterminal</i> symbol called
the <i>root</i> and a set of <i>production rules</i>. If all the production
rules are either of the form <b>A -&gt; BC</b>, or <b>A -&gt; a</b>, where <b>A,
B, C </b>is a member of set<b> V</b> and<b> <span class=GramE>a<span
style='font-weight:normal'> is</span></span></b> a member of set <b>T</b> then
we say that the grammar is in Chomsky Normal Form (CNF).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>If we repeatedly apply the
production rules over the <i>root</i> symbol we will finally end up with a
string of <i>terminals</i>. Alternatively, we can start with a string of <i>terminals</i>
and reduce it using given production rules.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For example the string <span
class=SpellE><tt><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>ab</span></tt></span> can be
obtained by the first CFG presented in the sample input in the following way:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<pre>S -&gt; AB</pre><pre>AB -&gt; <span class=SpellE><span class=GramE>aB</span></span><span
class=GramE> ;</span> because A -&gt; a</pre><pre><span class=SpellE><span
class=GramE>aB</span></span> -&gt; <span class=SpellE>ab</span> ; because B -&gt; b</pre>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>But, we cannot obtain <span
class=GramE><tt><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>a</span></tt> from</span> S by
applying the production rules. The set of strings of <i>terminals</i> derivable
from the <i>root</i> symbol of a CFG is called the Language of the CFG. In this
problem you are required to determine whether a given string of <i>terminals</i>
is in the Language of a CFG or not.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>There will be several test cases
in the input. Each test case describes a CFG in Chomsky Normal Form and will
adhere to the following description. In the first line there will be the <i>root</i>
symbol. It will always be an uppercase English letter. In line 2 the set <b>V</b>
will be presented as a string of uppercase letters. Each character of the
string will be identified as a member of <b>V</b>. The set <b>T</b> will be
given as a string of printable characters (except # or any whitespace
characters) in line 3. Each character of the string will be identified as a
member of <b>T</b>. Then there will be several lines for each production rule.
A production rule will be of the form <b>A -&gt; BC</b> or of the form <b>A
-&gt; a</b>. Here <b>A, B, C</b> are from set <b>V</b> and <span class=GramE><b>a</b>
is</span> from set <b>T</b>. A production rule of the form <b># -&gt; #</b>
indicates the end of production rules. After that there will be several lines
each containing a candidate string of printable characters. This string will
not contain any character from <b>V</b> and there will be no more than 50
characters in it. The list of candidate strings will be terminated with a line <span
class=GramE>containing a <b>#</b></span> in the first column.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Tahoma'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each candidate string &#945;
print &quot;&#945; is in L (G)&quot; if it can <span class=GramE>derived</span>
from the given grammar otherwise print &quot;&#945; is not in L (G)&quot;.
Output a blank line after each test case.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Tahoma'>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'><pre>S</pre><pre>SABC</pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>ab</span></pre><pre>S -&gt; AB</pre><pre>S -&gt; BC</pre><pre>A -&gt; BA</pre><pre>A -&gt; a</pre><pre>B -&gt; CC</pre><pre>B -&gt; b</pre><pre>C -&gt; AB</pre><pre>C -&gt; a</pre><pre># -&gt; #</pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>baaba</span></pre><pre><span class=SpellE>ab</span></pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>abaa</span></pre><pre>a</pre><pre><span class=SpellE>aaaaa</span></pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>bbbbb</span></pre><pre>#</pre><pre>S</pre><pre>SAB</pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>ab</span></pre><pre>S -&gt; AB</pre><pre>A -&gt; AA</pre><pre>A -&gt; a</pre><pre>B -&gt; b</pre><pre># -&gt; #</pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>ab</span></pre><pre><span class=SpellE>aaab</span></pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>aba</span></pre><pre><span class=SpellE>baaaaaaaa</span></pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>abbbbbb</span></pre><pre><span class=SpellE>aaaaaba</span></pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>baaaaaaaab</span></pre><pre><span class=SpellE>aaaa</span></pre><pre>a</pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>ab</span></pre><pre>#</pre></td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'><pre><span
  class=SpellE>baaba</span> is in L(G)</pre><pre><span class=SpellE>ab</span> is in L(G)</pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>abaa</span> is in L(G)</pre><pre>a is not in L(G)</pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>aaaaa</span> is in L(G)</pre><pre><span class=SpellE>bbbbb</span> is not in L(G)</pre><pre><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>ab</span> is in L(G)</pre><pre><span class=SpellE>aaab</span> is in L(G)</pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>aba</span> is not in L(G)</pre><pre><span class=SpellE>baaaaaaaa</span> is not in L(G)</pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>abbbbbb</span> is not in L(G)</pre><pre><span class=SpellE>aaaaaba</span> is not in L(G)</pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>baaaaaaaab</span> is not in L(G)</pre><pre><span class=SpellE>aaaa</span> is not in L(G)</pre><pre>a is not in L(G)</pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>ab</span> is in L(G)</pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='border:none;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .75pt;
padding:0cm;mso-padding-alt:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>Problemsetter: Tanveer
Ahsan<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>International Islamic
University </span></b><st1:City><st1:place><b><span style='font-family:Tahoma'>Chittagong</span></b></st1:place></st1:City><b><span
style='font-family:Tahoma'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>
