<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1031"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
<meta content="  name=Author>
<meta content="  name=Keywords>
<meta content="  name=Description>
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#772222" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoTitle><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Problem C<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoSubtitle><span class=MsoHyperlink><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;text-decoration:none;
text-underline:none'>Bombs! NO they are Mines!!</span></span><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;mso-layout-grid-align:
none'><b><span style='font-family:Arial;color:black'>Input:</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;color:black'> standard input<br>
<b>Output:</b> standard output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;color:black'>Time
Limit: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>4</span><span style='font-family:Arial;color:black'> seconds</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>It's the year <b>3002</b>. The robots of <b>&quot;ROBOTS
'R US (R:US)&quot;</b> have taken control over the world. You are one of the few
people who remain alive only to act as their guinea pigs. From time to time the
robots use you to find if they have been able to become more intelligent. You,
being the smart guy, have always been successful in proving to be more
intelligent. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Today is your big day. If you can beat the
fastest robot in the <b>IRQ2003</b> land, you'd be free. These robots are
intelligent. However, they have not been able to overcome a major deficiency in
their physical design -- they can only move in <b>4</b> directions: <u>F</u>orward,
<u>B</u>ackward, <u>U</u>pward and <u>D</u>ownward. And they take 1 unit time
to travel 1 unit distance. As you have got only one chance, you're planning it
thoroughly. The robots have left one of the fastest robot to guard you. You'd
need to program another robot which would carry you through the rugged terrain.
A crucial part of your plan requires you to find the how much time the guard
robot would need to reach your destination. If you can beat him, you're
through. </p>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=283 valign=top style='width:2.95in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<img width=264 height=189
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/106/p10653.gif"  align=left>  
</td>
  <td width=288 valign=top style='width:3.0in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<img width=245 height=236 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/106/p10653.gif" >
 
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=283 valign=top style='width:2.95in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p>Bomb! No they are mines</p>
  </td>
  <td width=288 valign=top style='width:3.0in;border-top:none;border-left:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p>Sample input scenario</p>
  <p>S- source, D- Destination</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>We must warn you that the <b>IRQ2003</b> land is
not a pleasant place to roam. The R:US have dropped numerous bombs while they
invaded the human land. Most of the bombs have exploded. Still some of the
bombs remain acting as land mines. We have managed to get a map that shows the
unsafe regions of the <b>IRQ2003 </b>land; unfortunately your guard has a copy
of the map, too. We know that at most 40% of the area can be unsafe. If you are
to beat your guard, you'd have to find his fastest route long before he finds
it. </p>

<h3><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Input consists of several test cases. Each test
begins with two integers <b>R (1 &lt;= R &lt;= 1000), C (1 &lt;= C &lt;= 1000)</b>
-- they give you the total number of rows and columns in the grid map of the
land. Then follows the grid locations of the bombs. It starts with the number
of <b>rows, (0 &lt;= rows &lt;= R)</b> containing bombs. For each of the rows,
you'd have one line of input. These lines start with the row number, followed by
the number of bombs in that row. Then you'd have the column locations of that
many bombs in that row. The test case ends with the starting location (row,
column) followed by your destination (row, column). All the points in the
region is in the range <b>(0,0)</b> to <b>(R-1, C-1)</b>. Input ends with a
test case where <b>R=0</b> and <b>C=0</b>, you must not process this test case.
</p>

<h3><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, print the time the guard
robot would take to go from the starting location to the destination.</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                  </span><span
style="mso-spacerun: yes">         </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>10 10<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>9<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>0 1 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>1 1 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>2 2 2 9<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>3 2 1 7<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>5 3 3 6 9<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>6 4 0 1 2 7<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>7 3 0 3 8<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>8 2 7 9<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>9 3 2 3 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>0 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>9 9<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 0</span></b><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;color:black;mso-fareast-language:
  ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>18</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Problem setter: Monirul
Hasan, Member of Elite Problemsetters' Panel<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

Member of Elite Problemsetters' Panel<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:65.2pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoPlainText align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span lang=SV
style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span
lang=SV style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>The
Uxuhul Voting System</span></b><span lang=SV><br>
</span><b><span lang=SV style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span
lang=SV style='font-family:Arial'> standard input<br>
<b>Output:</b> standard output<br>
<b>Time Limit:</b> 1 second</span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
"MS Mincho";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>One of the world's first </span><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US'>civilizations </span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>was that of the ancient Uxuhul indians, in the jungles
of Central America. The Uxuhul culture flourished for almost a thousand years,
with its golden era around <b>3200 BC</b>. Each year high priests, representing
different parts of the realm, gathered in the capital to vote on important
matters. There were always exactly three issues to vote on, and each issue was
a simple yes/no question. The three issues were all decided in one single
voting round, in the following manner:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>All the priests would gather in a large room, with a
table in the centre. On the table lie three flat stones, each with one white,
and one black side. Each stone represented an issue, with the black side up
symbolising the outcome <b>'no'</b> and the white side the outcome <b>'yes'</b>.
Initially all stones had the black side up, representing negative outcome on
all issues. In order of age, from youngest to oldest, each priest voted, by
turning exactly one stone, thus (temporarily) changing the outcome of one
issue. It was not allowed to skip the vote, each priest had to flip a stone.
The colours of the side facing up on the stones after the oldest priest had
flipped the stone of his choice, determined the final outcome of the voting on
the three issues.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>The Uxuhul political life was rather complex, with a
lot of lobbying by different interest groups. Lobbying (and bribery), gave each
priest preferences between the eight different outcomes of the three issues.
Religious rules forced each priest to publicly state his preference order
between the eight outcomes, before the voting process started. Based on knowledge
of each other priest's preferences, it was possible for the priests to choose a
stone to flip in the way that it gained their interest best. As the Uxuhul were
advanced logicians, with deep knowledge of game theory, each priest was
actually able to vote in the optimal way!<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Eventually, the complexity and rigidity of their
political system brought the Uxuhul culture to collapse. Today only ruins
remain of their cities and temples. Historians and archaeologists try to
understand more about their history by studying the results from their yearly
votes. However, only records of the priests' preferences remain, not the actual
outcomes of the votes. Now it is your task to find a way to recover the
outcomes.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h3><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>The input begins with an integer <b>n</b>, <b>1&lt;n&lt;100</b>,
the number of voting rounds. Starting on the next line, <b>n</b> problems
follow, one by one. Each voting starts with a line containing an integer <b>m</b>,
<b>1&lt;m&lt;100</b>, stating the number of voting priests. Then there are <b>m</b>
lines, defining the preference order for the outcomes of the three issues for
each voter, in order, starting with the voter who will begin the voting
procedure. The preferences for each outcome (<b>NNN</b>, <b>NNY</b>, <b>NYN</b>,
<b>NYY</b>, <b>YNN</b>, <b>YNY</b>, <b>YYN</b>, and <b>YYY</b> respectively,
where <b>N</b> stands for no and <b>Y</b> for yes), are given as an integer
in the range <b>[1
8]</b>. Lower numbers indicate higher preference. The
preferences for the eight outcomes are given in the same order as the
enumeration of the outcomes above.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h3><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>For each of the <b>n</b> voting problems, output one
line describing the outcome of the votes for the three issues, <b>'Y'</b> for
yes, and <b>'N'</b> for no.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier New";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier New";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier New";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier New";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

yes">                              </span>Output for Sample Input</span><span
lang=SV style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>2<span style="mso-spacerun:
  yes">                                  </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>4<span style="mso-spacerun:
  yes">                                  </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:

  mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>8 6 3 1 2 4 5 7<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

  mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>8 3 6 5 1 2 7 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none'><b><span lang=EN-GB
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8</span></b><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=SV style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;color:black;
  mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  mso-layout-grid-align:none'><b><span lang=SV style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:
  SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>NYY<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <h4><span lang=SV>NNY</span></h4>
  </td>

</span></div>


<p class=MsoNormal><b><span lang=SV>Swedish National Contest</span></b></p>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]--><o:SmartTagType namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" name="State"/><o:SmartTagType namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" name="place"/>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633cc" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Contemplation! Algebra</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Time Limit: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>1 Second</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'>Given the value of <b>a+b </b>and <b>ab </b>you will have
to find the value of <b>a<sup>n</sup>+b<sup>n</sup></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>&nbsp;</p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt'>The input file
contains several lines of inputs. Each line except the last line contains <b>3</b>
non-negative integers <b>p</b>, <b>q</b> and <b>n</b>. Here <b>p</b> denotes
the value of <b>a+b</b> and <b>q</b> denotes the value of <b>ab</b>. Input is
terminated by a line containing only two zeroes. This line should not be
processed. Each number in the input file fits in a signed <b>32</b>-bit
integer. There will be no such input so that you have to find the value of <b>0<sup>0</sup></b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each line
of input except the last one produce one line of output. This line contains the
value of <b>a<sup>n</sup>+b<sup>n</sup></b>.<span style="mso-spacerun: yes"> 
</span>You can always assume that <b>a<sup>n</sup>+b<sup>n </sup></b>fits in a
signed 64-bit integer.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                  </span><span
style="mso-spacerun: yes">             </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>10 16 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>7 12 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>0 0</span></b><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=297 valign=top style='width:222.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>68<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>91</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem F</span></b><br>
<b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Maximum
Sum II</span></b><br>
<b>Input:</b> standard input<br>
<b>Output:</b> standard output<br>
<b>Time Limit:</b> 1 second<br>
&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText>In a given a sequence of non-negative integers you will
have to find such a sub-sequence in it whose summation is maximum. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h2>Input</h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains several
input sets. The description of each set is given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each set starts with an integer <b>N
(N&lt;1000)</b> that indicates how many numbers are in that set. Each of the
next <b>N</b> lines contains a single non-negative integer. All these numbers
are less than <b>10000</b>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input is terminated by a set
where <b>N=0</b>. This set should not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h2>Output</h2>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For each set of
input produce one line of output. This line contains one or more integers which
is are taken from the input sequence and whose summation is maximum. If there
is more than one such sub-sequence print the one that has minimum length. If
there is more than one sub-sequence of minimum length, output the one that
occurs first in the given sequence of numbers. A valid sub-sequence must have a
single number in it. Two consecutive numbers in the output are separated by a
single space.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='color:black;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow: 0;mso-yfti-lastrow: yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=297 valign=top style='width:222.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3
  4</span></b><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;</span></b><b><span
